name: Drunken Rampage
description:
Play and endless party game that seems that seems to get harder and harder with every trip to the punch bowl.

How to play

Use the left stick on any gamepad to punch left, right, up and down! The longer the rampage, the more Chain Bonus Points™ you'll see in the upper-left-hand corner.

Once you reach Maximum Chain™ mode, the screen will flash—that's your cue to press a button, take a drink, and pass the controller to the person next to you!

Continue until somebody forgets their name, the police arrive, or the cruel rays of dawn scatter your guests back home.

Play this game responsibly! Don't be an idiot.

*NOTE: Mac version has been temporarily removed while I sort out an issue. It will be replaced once this has been sorted out (2016-11-18).
